name: CLARA: Connectiing Local Agencies and Resources Automatically
description: An AI-powered client support platform that conducts voice-based check-ins, provides actionable task guides, and facilitates seamless collaboration to enhance efficiency and resource allocation for social workers

name: Food Allergy Tracker
description: A mobile app built with React Native and Expo to identify allergens, log user reactions to meals, and track distress-causing ingredients, leveraging AI and data analysis for accuracy.

name: Restaurant Recommendations System
description: A restaurant recommendation engine and web app prototype built with Flask and React, offering personalized suggestions and a dynamic menu, achieving high user satisfaction ratings.
